credit_line: Museum purchase from James B. Ford and Peter Cooper Hewitt Estate Funds
title: Drawing after a Serbian Vase
provenance: Le Corbusier (Charles Edouard Jeanneret-Gris), prior to 1936
medium: Graphite and red-brown crayon on white paperboard, mounted on canvas
description: Vertical drawing of a Moorish pottery vase, with large wing handles and figures of a horse and a man.
name: Drawing
